output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. CMF Number: Yes, contains "CMF 11240017" which indicates this is electoral propaganda
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, directly mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" who is a presidential candidate (Position 3)
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement on Facebook/Instagram with potential reach of 100,001-500,000 people
4. Electoral objective: Yes, it promotes: - PSD's country plan - Marcel Ciolacu's leadership - PSD's governance program - Uses campaign hashtag "#caleasigurapentrubihor"
5. Journalism: No, this is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content
6. Personal opinion: No, this is an organized campaign message with CMF number, posted by "Infomed Pro SRL"
The post combines presidential election messaging (mentioning Ciolacu) with parliamentary campaign elements, which makes it problematic as presidential campaign period has ended.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF number - Directly promotes a presidential candidate - Is a paid advertisement - Has clear electoral messaging - References both presidential and parliamentary campaigns
conclusion.message-for-police: Infomed Pro SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui material de propaganda electorala (ID Facebook: 1087041495976896) dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie electorala prezidentiala. Materialul promovat face referire directa la candidatul prezidential Marcel Ciolacu si programul sau de tara, fiind difuzat dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Postarea contine numar CMF (11240017), are caracter electoral explicit si a fost promovata platit pe platformele Facebook si Instagram, cu un impact estimat intre 100,001 si 500,000 de persoane.
